description: Sarah Brightman's Harem tracks are brought to life in this collection of music videos, inter-woven with interviews from the artist herself. This Special is filmed in many exotic locals including Egypt and Morocco, bringing to life...
name: Sarah Brightman: Harem - A Desert Fantasy

review.name: Great DVD!
review.reviewBody:
This is a great DVD, its not a concert, it's a special from PBS, it was broadcasted a while ago. It shows all her videos for her Harem CD.

It's different from all her other DVD's, because it's not a concert, you get to see all her videos and a behind the cameras :D

It contains a new video for Time To Say Goodbye and Anytime, Anywhere, a 30-minute behind the scenes documantary, and a photo gallery.

What I like most about the DVD is that you get to listen to Sarahs great voice (she has one of the most beautiful voices I have ever heard:D

The complete track (video)list is: 1.Harem. 2.Beautiful. 3.Mysterious Days. 4.Anytime, Anywhere. 5.It's a Beautiful Day. 6.Free. 7.The War Is Over. 8.What You Never Know. 9.Stranger In paradise. 10.Nessun Dorma (live). 11.What A Wonderful World. 12.The Journey Home. 13.Time To Say Goodbye.

Worth watching :D
